intro: Meum nutans, commonly known as the nodding meum, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Meum nutans is often found in rocky or gravelly soils and is adapted to dry, sunny environments.
